snippet: Ashley Diaz, 28, was charged with second-degree murder and first-degree assault on Thursday in the death of Kevasia Edwards.
abstract: Ashley Diaz of Queens pleads not guilty to second-degree murder and first-degree assault charges in connection with death of her youngest child, 2-year-old Kevasia Edwards; is second homicide in 2014 of small child whose family had previous contact with New York City's Administration for Children's Services.

byline.contributor: John Surico and Kate Taylor contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Ashley Diaz, 28, was charged with second-degree murder and first-degree assault on Thursday in the death of Kevasia Edwards.

headline.main: Mother Pleads Not Guilty in Death of 2-Year-Old
headline.print_headline: Mother Pleads Not Guilty in Death of 2-Year-Old
